title: Former FTX general counsel to launch new crypto exchange
description:
Former FTX general counsel Can Sun, who played a pivotal role as a key witness in the trial against Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF), is joining forces with other ex-FTX executives to establish a new cryptocurrency exchange, the Wall Street Journal reported. The Dubai-based start-up, known as Trek Labs, recently obtained a license from the Emirate’s crypto […]

The post Former FTX general counsel to launch new crypto exchange appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: CNBC’s Analysis: How Elon Musk’s Starlink Is Revolutionizing Global Internet Access and Funding SpaceX
description: SpaceX, formally known as Space Exploration Technologies Corp., is an American aerospace manufacturer and space transport services company founded by entrepreneur Elon Musk in 2002. The company has gained worldwide attention for a series of historic milestones. It is the only private company capable of returning a spacecraft from low Earth orbit. In 2012, its […]

title: Bitcoin Difficulty Hits Record 64.68 Trillion Amid 5 Straight Increases Since September
description: On Sunday, November 12, 2023, Bitcoin’s difficulty metric climbed 3.55%, reaching a new peak of 64.68 trillion at block height 816,480. This adjustment marks the fifth consecutive rise in the network’s difficulty since September 19. Bitcoin Difficulty Rises 3.55% Higher The quest to discover a bitcoin (BTC) block reward has reached unprecedented difficulty following the […]

title: Bithumb sets sights on IPO to rebalance crypto power
description: The latest strategy could underscore a trust-centric approach deemed crucial for regaining Bithumb's leading position in the Korean crypto exchange space.

title: IOTA: Powering Industry 4.0 – A Look at Its Vital Role in Industrial IoT
description: In the ongoing fourth industrial revolution (Industry 4.0), IoTA, with its MIOTA cryptocurrency and non-profit foundation, emerges as a crucial technology. Tailored for the Internet of Things (IoT), IoTA’s decentralized ledger technology, based on DAG technology, facilitates secure, feeless, and energy-efficient transactions.
